casebody.data:
Samuel ZALMANOFF, Plaintiff Below, Appellant,
v.
John A. HARDY, Kenneth I. Denos, Fraser Atkinson, Alessandro Benedetti, Richard F. Bergner, Henry W. Hankinson, Robert L. Knauss, Bertrand Des Pallieres, and Equus Total Return, Inc., Defendants Below, Appellees. No. 609, 2018 Supreme Court of Delaware. Submitted: May 15, 2019
Decided: May 16, 2019

AFFIRMED.
